item.title: Overflowing bins and flytipping, 17th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prospect Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Consistent dog fouling on even numbers side of Heathwood Gardens from 64 towards lower numbers, 17th December
item.description:
Daily dog fouling and not removing it, similar spot everyday and seems to be very early morning or late at night so we don’t know the offender. It’s the same 50 metre area and there are about 10 examples still there, it is a main walking route for primary school children and very antisocial. Issue has been present a long time but in the last few weeks is much worse.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heathwood Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Countdown not working, 17th December
Outside no 14 Ornan Road, 17th December
item.description:
I have noticed that in the last year since I moved here, I have this street light directly outside my bedroom window. Even with blinds closed, every night, the light from this lamp majorly spills into my bedroom. It has no directional control of the light, so spills into my home instead/as well of lighting the street. My room remains lit throughout the night and I don’t sleep properly and it is because the room is too light. Please can this lamp be changed or have a shade cover on the house side of the glass surround so it does not spill very brightly into my bedroom property on the ground floor. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ornan Road, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
